metadata.title: CVE-2022-2400 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: External Control of File Name or Path in GitHub repository dompdf/dompdfprior to 2.0.0.

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
